trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Chandler
There were no other sightings in Chandler on or around May 24th 2009
Summary: Two or three flashes followed by one larger flash.
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile sitting outside with girlfriend we noticed what seemed like a lightning flash. There was only a few very small clouds almost a 100% clear night. I did not see where the flash came from and I thought it came from the south. My girlfriend did see it and said it was from the north but whatever it was it was very bright. It started out as a pulsing flash like lightning off in the distance. It pulsed and then ended with one very bright flash. I stood up and looked behind me to see if there was any vapor trail from a possible meteor entry but there was nothing. My girlfriend also said it left no trail... just disappeared. I waited to hear if there was any sound but no rumble was heard. I checked the weather radar and it there was nothing around for a hundred miles.
